results.definition: one of the large alphabetic characters used as the first letter in writing or printing proper names and sometimes for emphasis; capitals were kept in the upper half of the type case and so became known as upper-case letters"
examples: printers once kept the type for capitals and for small letters in separate cases

results.definition: of or relating to a style of writing characterized by somewhat rounded capital letters; 4th to 8th centuries

examples: many medieval manuscripts are in majuscule script
